DOC.brief_summary: This study include patient visit refractive surgery ( photorefractive keratectomy , photorefractive keratectomy corneal collagen cross linking , laser situ keratomileusis , small incision lenticule extraction ) , phakic Intraocular Lens implantation ( Implantable Collamer Lens , artiflex ) , cataract surgery . Patients examine whether iris recognition scanner smartphone work surgery . In addition , pupil dilation ( 5mm , 6mm , 7mm , 8mm ) , patient examine whether iris recognition scanner smartphone work well .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Effect Laser Vision Surgery , Phakic Intraocular Lens Implantation , Cataract Surgery , Pupil Dilation Iris Recognition Scanner Function Smartphone
DOC.criteria: Patients visit refractive surgery ( photorefractive keratectomy , photorefractive keratectomy corneal collagen cross linking , laser situ keratomileusis , small incision lenticule extraction ) phakic Intraocular Lens implantation ( Implantable Collamer Lens , artiflex ) cataract surgery . age 20~90 history previous ocular intraocular surgery glaucoma ocular hypertension , ocular infection , nondry eye ocular inflammation , ocular allergy , autoimmune disease history iris damage ocular surgery previous trauma wear contact lens study period presence current punctal occlusion pregnancy , lactate woman , child
